about_the_game:
Interplanetary Gardener is a 3rd person vehicle based action game.
Mow the lawn and remove pesky weeds while surviving harsh climates on alien planets. Use your hard earned credits to upgrade & customize a wide array of high-tech vehicles & tools.

Play your way. Make different builds that prioritize mobility, weed removal & survival. Choose to cash out from the weeds, or use them as fuel for special abilities such as boosters & radars.
But remember, different planets have different properties and will require intensive build planning as well as improvisation.

  • Vehicles: Wide array of vehicles, from space trikes to VTOLs. Each has different strengths & weaknesses and it’s up to YOU to experiment with what works best in different situations.
  • Equipment: High-tech equipment such as weed-killer spray, laser lawnmower and teleporters.
  • Physics: Adrenaline pumping physics, as you race to make your job quota in the allocated time.
  • Procedurally generated planets: Featuring types with different properties such as gravity, hazards & grip. No playthrough will be the same.
  • Hazards: From dust storms to meteor strikes, being an interplanetary gardener is a high risk occupation, but the higher the risks the higher the rewards!

Interplanetary Gardener is a 3rd person vehicle based action game.
Mow the lawn and remove pesky weeds while surviving harsh climates on alien planets. Use your hard earned credits to upgrade & customize a wide array of high-tech vehicles & tools.

name: Interplanetary Gardener

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 520M or Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Mow the lawn, survive harsh climates on alien planets, and use your credits to upgrade high-tech equipment. Become the best interplanetary gardener!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
